title: Pull Up a Seat at Seasons Kitchen Counter at Four Seasons Residence club aviaraTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Pull Up a Seat at Seasons Kitchen Counter at Four Seasons Residence club aviara
For a close-up look at culinary magic, make a reservation at the Kitchen Counter at Seasons Restaurant. With a front-row seat alongside Seasons working kitchen, and a menu that changes daily, you’ll experience a thrilling culinary adventure. Allow the chefs to delight and surprise taste buds with a five-course menu based around guest preferences and the day’s freshest seasonal ingredients.
Seasons’ culinary team will prepare a one-of-a-kind meal with an emphasis on what’s local, seasonal and organic. In the casual yet dynamic setting of Seasons Restaurant, guests will savour a feast for the eyes as well as palate, with the option to pair the meal with a libation from a thoughtfully curated collection of wines and locally sourced craft beers.The five-course meal is USD 85 per person, and the menu changes daily. The Kitchen Counter experience is available by reservation only.
Source:-Four Seasons
